mapper.insert: insert into question (title, description, gmt_create,gmt_modified, creator, comment_count, view_count, like_count, tag) values (#{title},#{description},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified},#{creator},#{commentCount},#{viewCount},#{likeCount},#{tag})
mapper.select: select count(1) from question where creator=#{accountId}
select * from question where creator=#{accountId} limit #{offset},#{size}
